snippet: Italy’s Luna Rossa benefited from a big penalty against Artemis Racing just before the start to complete a four-race sweep of the America’s Cup challenger semifinals Saturday on San Francisco Bay
abstract: Italy’s Luna Rossa benefits from big penalty against Artemis Racing just before the start to complete a four-race sweep of the America’s Cup challenger semifinals on San Francisco Bay
lead_paragraph: Italy’s Luna Rossa benefited from a big penalty against Artemis Racing just before the start to complete a four-race sweep of the America’s Cup challenger semifinals Saturday on San Francisco Bay
